items.text: just a touch to straight, and there's no fuss in Kayes' flick to leg.
items.postText: ""Donald Tiripano replaces Chatara in the attack" - Bless me, I read that as "Donald Trump"!!" Good grief no, Naseef! As bare as Zimbabwe's cupboards are, they'd never stoop to that.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: probing delivery from Jarvis, right up to Das, who digs it out.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Liton Das, no run

items.text: slower from Jarvis, rolling his fingers over it. Das spots the change of pace early and collects a single to third man
items.shortText: Jarvis to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full, straight, and Kayes roots himself to the crease as he defends to point.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: Kayes whips behind square on the leg side, and Chatara has to give chase as the ball passes to his right at short fine leg. He runs it down to keep them to two.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: hurled down outside off, and Das hangs his bat out to collect a single behind square.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: some timing here for Kayes, but the placement is lacking and his backfoot punch goes straight to mid off.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fifty up! Tiripano comes round the wicket, and Kayes turns him round the corner for a single that takes his team score to 50. Fist bumps all round in the middle.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: Das leans forward to drive, but hits cover.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Liton Das, no run

items.text: slower ball from Tiripano, and he has his hands on his head as Das mistimes a drive.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Liton Das, no run

items.text: once again, a backfoot punch hits cover.
items.postText: And here's Shashank Kishore to take over comms. Cheers!
items.shortText: Tiripano to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Thank you, Liam. Trust your comeback was quite grand.
items.text: flatter one on length, spinning back in from middle, tucked to square leg for an easy single
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: shorter in length, works this from outside off towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mavuta to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: too short, he makes a bit of room and steers this into the gap at deep point. Cleverly done, but some fine tag-team effort in the deep keeps this down to just two.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: toe-ends this pull to short fine leg. Wanted to hit it a lot square.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: this is poor bowling, drops short and is lucky to get away again. Much more authority in the pull but straight to deep backward square leg.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: driven with the spin to extra cover.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on off from round the stumps, Imrul walks down the pitch and bunts it to cover point.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: slips this down leg, tickled to beat short fine. Delicately done by Imrul, was aware of the fielder being inside the ring and directed this just wide of him.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: glides this down to square third man for an easy single
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: skiddy bouncer, Liton shaped to pull but decided to duck under it finally. Hardly carried to Brendan Taylor  behind the stumps.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Liton Das, no run

items.text: works this off his hip to deep square leg
items.shortText: Tiripano to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: stands tall and punches this length delivery to extra cover.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: goes right back and across to blunt this shortish delivery.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Liton Das, no run

items.text: the slog sweep and boy, he's cleared the long-on boundary quite comfortably. Brave, because he was hitting it against the turn. Didn't get underneath the length but went through with the stroke too.
items.shortText: Mavuta to Liton Das, SIX runs
